description: Use the verification code that was received by the verified destination phone number to opt-in the verified destination phone number to receive more messages.

parameters.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the verififed destination phone number.

parameters.name: VerificationCode
parameters.description: The verification code that was received by the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status for being able to send messages to the phone number.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the destination phone number was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
